overview:
## Discussion

When this property is set, the transition controller acts as a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning] object for the transition from the browser to the document view controller. It provides transition animation that zooms and cross fades from the document’s thumbnail to the target view.
